availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: G. W. Mills (Monticello, Kentucky, farmer and judge)

body.p: Monticello, Wayne County, Kentucky, farmer and judge. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah A. Mills. Married to Lucinda Elane Mills in Monticello on July 8, 1857. Farmer in Monticello in 1850. Judge in Wayne County in 1860. Judge in Wayne County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Wayne County, District 2, p. 271B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Wayne County, Monticello, p. 227.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Wayne County Marriages, Film #000591550, p. 95.
